subtitle: A delightful medley of fresh vegetables sprinkled with poppy seeds.

method.text: Place the carrot, broccoli and asparagus into a steamer and steam for 3-5 min or until tender.
Meanwhile mix together the butter, orange rind and seasoning. Drain the vegetables thoroughly of any moisture. Toss in with the butter in a bowl.
Transfer to warmed serving plates. Sprinkle with poppy seeds and serve.

title: Vegetable medley with poppy seeds
